title: hAiKyUu
body: A anime i got into over a year ago- i haven't personally really watched the show- but ive read some of the books otherwise i do have fav characters like Kuroo and Kenma ( Speaking of them i have a funny story) This girl i used to talk to rlly liked the series but yet had no idea who they were. but yet she knew who Oikawa was üòí, oikawa is cool tho. :D well that's it.

title: kenma fun facts
body: favorite game kenma's played?' 'metal gear. it's our mutual favorite.' 'least favorite color?' 'mustard yellow.He neither likes nor hates volleyball; he hates getting tired. Up till middle school, he would easily get sick after practice days or matches. His nerves are always on edge because he doesn't want to be noticed.Favorite Food: Apple pie. He is an only child.1 INTP, The Logician - Kenma Kozume. From Japanese ÂÅ• (ken) meaning ‚Äúhealthy, strong‚Äù combined with Áúü (ma) meaning ‚Äúreal, genuine‚Äù.
